SEARCH

Class ClientBase

java.lang.Object
ClientBase
public class ClientBase extends Object
Uses the sorted linked dictionary to create and maintain a list of clients and their orders. The client base is used to add, remove, and get clients and their orders.

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public boolean addClient(String name, String address, String phone, String email, int age)
      Adds a new client to the client base with a placeholder for orders
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the client
      address - the address of the client, can be null
      phone - the phone number of the client, can be null
      email - the email of the client, can be null
      age - the age of the client
      Returns:
      true if the client was added successfully, false otherwise

    • changeClientInfo

      public boolean changeClientInfo(String userName, String address, String phone, String email, int age)

    • addProduce

      public boolean addProduce(String userName, String produce, int quantity)
      adds an order to the client's list of orders, removes the same amount from the Inventory
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client to add to
      produce - the produce to add to the order
      quantity - the quantity of the produce to add to the order
      Returns:
      true if the produce was added successfully, false otherwise

    • getProduce

      public Produce getProduce(String userName, String produceName)
      Gets the produce object from the client's list of orders
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      produceName - the name of the produce
      Returns:
      the produce object if found, null otherwise

    • getClient

      public Client getClient(String userName)
      Gets the client object from the client base
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      Returns:
      the client object if found, null otherwise

    • getOrders

      public Produce[] getOrders(String userName)
      Retrieves the orders of a client
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      Returns:
      an array of produce objects if the client is found, null otherwise

    • getAllOrders

      public Produce[][] getAllOrders()

    • removeClient

      public boolean removeClient(String userName)
      Removes a client from the client base
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      Returns:
      an array of produce objects if the client is found, null otherwise

    • removeOrder

      public Boolean removeOrder(String userName, String produce, int quantity)
      Removes an order from the client's list of orders
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      produce - the produce to remove from the order
      quantity - the quantity of the produce to remove from the order
      Returns:
      true if the produce was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • cancelOrder

      public boolean cancelOrder(String userName, String produceName, int quantity)
      Cancels an order and adds the produce back to the Inventory
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      produceName - the name of the produce
      quantity - the quantity of the produce to cancel
      Returns:
      true if the order was cancelled successfully, false otherwise

    • checkQuantity

      public int checkQuantity(String userName, String produceName)
      Checks the quantity of a produce in a client's order
      Parameters:
      userName - the user name of the client
      produceName - the name of the produce
      Returns:
      the quantity of the produce in the order, -1 if the client or produce is not found
